scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn prepare:mainnet && bash -c 'source .env || true && graph deploy --studio $SUBGRAPH_MAINNET'
scripts.deploy:goerli: yarn prepare:goerli && bash -c 'source .env || true && graph deploy --studio $SUBGRAPH_GOERLI'
scripts.deploy:gnosis-chain: yarn prepare:gnosis-chain && bash -c 'source .env || true && graph deploy --studio $SUBGRAPH_GNOSIS_CHAIN'
scripts.deploy:arbitrum-one: yarn prepare:arbitrum-one && bash -c 'source .env || true && graph deploy --studio $SUBGRAPH_ARBITRUM_ONE'
scripts.deploy:avalanche: yarn prepare:avalanche && bash -c 'source .env || true && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ $SUBGRAPH_AVALANCHE'
scripts.deploy:bsc: yarn prepare:bsc && bash -c 'source .env || true && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ $SUBGRAPH_BSC'
scripts.deploy:optimism: yarn prepare:optimism && bash -c 'source .env || true && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ $SUBGRAPH_OPTIMISM'
scripts.deploy:polygon: yarn prepare:polygon && bash -c 'source .env || true && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ $SUBGRAPH_POLYGON'
scripts.deploy:optimism-on-gnosis-chain: yarn prepare:optimism-on-gnosis-chain && bash -c 'source .env || true && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ $SUBGRAPH_OPTIMISM_ON_GNOSIS_CHAIN'
